p: A linear regression model was adjusted using the stepwise variable selection method, with Akaike information criterion (AIC). IOP of the right eye (OD) considered the dependent variable and age, race, sex, CD4 count, VL, group association 1,2 and 3, family history of glaucoma, biomicroscopy, optic, pachymetry, BUT and comorbidities were considered as independent variables.
